sense.gloss: to fly (a kite, etc.), to launch (fireworks, etc.), to surface (a submarine, etc.)
to enrol (one's child in school), to enroll
to increase (price, quality, status, etc.), to develop (talent, skill), to improve
to make (a loud sound), to raise (one's voice)
to give (an example, etc.), to cite
to summon up (all of one's energy, etc.)
to offer up (incense, a prayer, etc.) to the gods (or Buddha, etc.)
to conduct (a ceremony, esp. a wedding)
to do for (the sake of someone else)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にお↑金↑↓かね↓を|あげる|から↑俺↑↓おれ↓が↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓なのか。
sdata.e: Do you need me to give you some money?

sdata.j: ↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓には↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓を|あげる|よ。
sdata.e: I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.

sdata.j: ↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓には↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓を|あげる|よ。
sdata.e: You shall have a bicycle for your birthday.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑車↑↓くるま↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓の↑仕方↑↓しかた↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えて|あげる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll teach you how to drive a car.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にこのペンダントを|あげる|よ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓に|あげる|いいものがあるんだ。
sdata.e: I have a nice present to give you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑死↑↓し↓んだら↑骨↑↓ほね↓を↑拾↑↓ひろ↓って|あげる|。
sdata.e: I'll look after your affairs when you are dead.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓が↑見↑↓み↓れるように、カーテンを↑開↑↓あ↓けて|あげる|ね。
sdata.e: I'll open the curtain for you to look out.

sdata.j: ↑魚↑↓さかな↓の↑捕↑↓と↓り↑方↑↓かた↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えて|あげる|よ。
sdata.e: I'll show you how to catch fish.

sdata.j: ↑虚心坦懐↑↓きょしんたんかい↓に↑申↑↓もう↓し↑上↑↓|あ↓げる|。↑今↑↓いま↓から↑言↑↓い↓うことは、↑言葉↑↓ことば↓どおりに↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓ってほしい。
sdata.e: I'm going to speak to you with utmost candor so I want you to take everything I'm about to say at face value.
